mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id, a.employment_kbn, b.reflection_date, b.reflection_flag, a.surname_jp || ' ' || a.givenname_jp AS fullname_jp, a.surname_en || ' ' || a.givenname_en AS fullname_en, a.employee_id, b.application_use_flag_02 AS cybozu, b.application_use_flag_03 AS parallel_computing, b.application_use_flag_04 AS vpn_usage, b.application_use_flag_05 AS education_system, b.application_use_flag_06 AS exercise_room FROM t_user_sub a INNER JOIN t_user_system_sub b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.reflection_flag = '1' AND a.employment_kbn in ('1','2','3','4') AND a.reflection_date = #{reflectionDate}::date
